synopsis.text: Dark Lord Leonis Death Magnus, the formidable undead sorcerer, awakens after a thousand-year magical slumber to find himself in an unexpected form: a ten-year-old boy! In this unfamiliar era, he encounters Riselia, a silver-haired young woman battling the menacing creatures known as Voids, which have nearly wiped out humanity. To navigate this new world and unravel its mysteries, Leonis joins Excalibur Academy, a school dedicated to training students to combat these enigmatic monsters. As he hides his true powers from his new guardian, Leonis wonders if the Voids could be linked to his past. Follow Leonis' journey as he adapts to this strange era and faces new challenges while keeping his true identity a secret.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
